ygData.subject: Re: A tale of some boots
ygData.msgSnippet: Melaniel your story is wonderful!  I regret even more now being already camped that day instead of in Sol with you.  Sounds like it was just wonderful though,
ygData.messageBody:
Melaniel your story is wonderful! I regret even more now being already camped that
day instead of in Sol with you. Sounds like it was just wonderful though, and much
better experience for you. Congratulations on your achievement!

As for lambent gauntlets, just find me in game; I have a present for you.

Maravana Vireo
50th Bard of Jus Divinum
Mithaniel Marr
